Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails. Listen to some music to get in the zone.
Start developing the main characters. Focus on the protagonist: name, background, initial motivations, and personality traits. Brainstorm several options.
Choose the most compelling protagonist concept and flesh it out further. Develop their relationships with other key characters in the game.
Lunch break. Chat with colleagues in the break room.
Develop the main supporting characters: their names, backgrounds, motivations, and relationships to the protagonist. Create character sketches.

Email @Cart-1 with character sketches and descriptions, requesting concept art for the protagonist and key supporting characters. @Cart-1: could you please provide some concept designs for our main characters?
Begin outlining the character arcs for the main characters. How will they change throughout the story? What challenges will they face?
Wrap up for the day. Review character notes and plan for tomorrow.
